text: Hi can anyone confirm for me which version of the API is used in serverless functions? I seem to be running into errors using the associations v4 APIs while they work fine on my local
I would suggest using the endpoints directly through axios (node) or requests (python), the SDK can sometimes get things wrong and I’ve found using the endpoints directly to be a much better solution

yeah i was about to scrap it all and rewrite it because of that. Was debating trying the v3 ones but the v3 is missing the list endpoint so was thinking about just using axios. Thanks for the push I needed to move in that direction
I’m a little confused by this, what are you trying to do?
Of course bro, let me know if you run into any issues
Are you running the function in dev? Or is this a did you upload the card to your account?
